title: Hello Darling
creator_credit: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Mike Helal left Lebanon at the height of the war and migrated to Melbourne. Reluctant to leave, Mike started to see the beauty of his new home. Despite this, nothing deters him as he waits to be reunited with his loved one again.
creator_credit_for_label: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
